subject: Mental Health
title: Medical Trauma
description: A fast breakdown of Medical Trauma for builders.

hook.text: The hospital saved your life, but the experience left invisible scars.

buildup.text: Invasive procedures, ICU stays, and near-death events can traumatize patients.

discovery.text: About 25 percent of ICU survivors develop PTSD symptoms afterward.

twist.text: Medical trauma is rarely recognized because the event was supposed to help.

punchline.text: Healing the body can sometimes wound the mind.
